overview: The Honey Comb is an accessory dropped by the Queen Bee boss that releases 1-3 / [e=1-4] bees which attack nearby enemies every time the wearer takes damage. On the Desktop version, it also grants the Honey buff after being damaged.
notes: The Honey Comb will always summon 1 bee, after which it will try twice with a 33% chance for an extra bee to be summoned. With the Hive Pack equipped, there is an additional 33% chance for a fourth bee to be summoned. The average amount of bees summoned per hit is 1.66 / [e=1.99].

Bees summoned by the Honey Comb always do [i:UI:Mobile version] 7 / [i:UI:Desktop version] 13 / [e=18] / [m=26] base damage. Any of the bees can be "strong bees", and these stronger variations will do [i:UI:Mobile version] 8-11 / [i:UI:Desktop version] 18 / [e=27] / [m=36] damage and 0.5 knockback.

The Honey Comb's, Sweetheart Necklace's, Honey Balloon's and Bee Cloak's bee spawning effect do not stack. The same amount of bees will appear after being damaged no matter how many of these items are equipped.
The Honey Comb works well with a full set of Orichalcum armor as the bee damage will activate the armor's set bonus and causes the flower petals to attack.
title: Honey Comb
tooltip: Releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
